Bibliographies

Your folder already contains a references.bib file. One way of creating this bibliography is by exporting a collection in Zotero reference management tool. However, references can also be added by searching from within RStudio.

As part of the preparation your an article by [@wilson2017].

Place at the cursor at the end of the sentence above and remove the placeholder

In visual editing mode, click Insert -> Citation

Open the Crossref dialogue on the left

Search for "good enough practices in scientific computing"

Click on the reference to highlight it

Click on the `+` button at the top right of the reference

Click Insert on the bottom right of the page

Render the document to see the changes
